definition:
Similar to ratchet. There are a few variations of the definition.Being of bare sustenance/degraded status.
Minimal comfort level.
Food stamps.
Having little to no swag.Being that dough = money, grain therefore is less than money, as it is less than dough. Taking this concept, grain thus becomes a term describing all that is lame and uncool.Also derived from low quality cinema showing a picture quality described as "grainy"

Shortened version of grain alcohol. Usually mixed with gatorade because of it's strong bite. Often popular in prison because of its cheap, easy process that yields a strong product. Also known as White Lightning.
